statements: UPDATE Shows SET viewership = 5000, advertising_revenue = 2500.00 WHERE show_id = 100
UPDATE Shows SET show_name = 'New Show Name', airing_time = '2021-09-15 08:00:00' WHERE show_id = 200
UPDATE Shows SET viewership = 100000, advertising_revenue = 50000.75 WHERE show_id = 1
UPDATE Shows SET show_name = 'New Show Name', airing_time = '2022-11-30 18:00:00' WHERE show_id = 2
UPDATE tv_shows SET rating = 8.5, viewership = 1000000 WHERE show_id = 101;
UPDATE advertising SET ad_cost = 5000.00, ad_duration = 30 WHERE ad_id = 201;
UPDATE tv_shows SET genre = 'Drama', rating = 8.7 WHERE show_id = 101;
UPDATE advertising SET ad_duration = 30, ad_cost = 5000.00 WHERE ad_id = 201;
UPDATE tv_show_popularity SET popularity_rating = 8.5 WHERE show_id = 1001;
UPDATE advertising_revenue SET revenue = 25000.00, show_id = 1002 WHERE ad_id = 2001;
UPDATE tv_show_popularity SET popularity_rating = 8.5 WHERE show_id = 12345;
UPDATE viewership_statistics SET viewership_count = 10000, show_id = 54321 WHERE viewer_id = 98765;
UPDATE TV_Shows SET director_name = 'John Doe' WHERE show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Viewership_Stats SET average_rating = 8.5, viewer_demographics = '{"gender": "male", "age": 25}' WHERE stats_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE TV_Shows SET director_name = 'Steven Spielberg' WHERE show_id = '1a2b3c4d5e';
UPDATE Advertising_Revenue SET ad_duration = '02:30:00' WHERE show_id = '6f7g8h9i0j';

UPDATE Advertising SET ad_revenue=500.00 WHERE ad_id=3;
UPDATE Shows SET release_year = 2022 WHERE show_name = 'Stranger Things';
UPDATE Advertising SET ad_revenue = 50000.00, advertiser_name = 'Coca-Cola' WHERE show_id = (SELECT show_id FROM Shows WHERE show_name = 'Game of Thrones');
